description:
Protect your hands in cold water. 2mm neoprene locks in body heat without sacrificing dexterity. A grippy palm provides a secure hold on your canoe, kayak or paddleboard paddle.

  • Super stretchy 2mm neoprene with stiched and glued seams
  • Print on palm and thumb for grip in slippery situations
  • Hook-and-loop adjustable wrist strap holds gloves securely
name: Level Six Electron 2mm Neoprene Gloves - Unisex
